metadata.Title: CVE-2021-40085 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in OpenStack Neutron before 16.4.1, 17.x before 17.2.1, and 18.x before 18.1.1. Authenticated attackers can reconfigure dnsmasq via a crafted extra_dhcp_opts value.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This issue is fixed in (2:16.4.1-0ubuntu2) in focal-updates and (2:18.1.1-0ubuntu2) in hirsute-updates, but they have not yet been released to -security.

criterions.comment: neutron package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
